name: Her Bedtime Stories
description:
Sensitive content warning: Trauma, Sexual Coercion

Her Bedtime Stories tells the story of giving in to thoughts related to trauma, through the visual device of a platform that is constantly sinking deeper into a mine.  Your role is to observe and help when you can. This game was created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare game jam, but also in dedication to Sexual Assault Awareness Month(SAAM), April 2021. Below I have listed some information that explains SAAM more.

Tips

When you get to the typing level, type slowly to ensure the computer reads the input properly. (Working on this bug fix at the moment)

SAAM Resources

A Guide For Friends and Family of Sexual Violence Survivors (PCAR): A guide for family and friends of sexual assault survivors to understand what the survivor may be going through.

RAINN: (Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network) is the nation's largest anti-sexual violence organization. RAINN created and operates the National Sexual Assault Hotline

National Sexual Violence Resource Center (NSVRC): Learn more about SAAM and its history through graphics, blogs, and prevention resources.
